fields.title: Django Unchained
fields.synopsis: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.
fields.excerpt: A freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.synopsis: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.
fields.excerpt: When Earth becomes uninhabitable, an ex-NASA pilot and a team of researchers mission is to find a new planet for humans.

fields.title: Parasite
fields.synopsis: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.
fields.excerpt: When Earth becomes uninhabitable, an ex-NASA pilot and a team of researchers mission is to find a new planet for humans.

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.synopsis: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son, Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.
fields.excerpt: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son, Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

fields.title: Dangal
fields.synopsis: Mahavir Singh Phogat, a former wrestler, decides to fulfil his dream of winning a gold medal for his country by training his daughters for the Commonwealth Games despite the existing social stigmas.
fields.excerpt: Mahavir Singh Phogat, a former wrestler, decides to fulfil his dream of winning a gold medal for his country by training his daughters for the Commonwealth Games despite the existing social stigmas.

fields.title: The Wailing
fields.synopsis: When an outsider visits a village, its inhabitants experience a mysterious epidemic. A police officer then tries to solve the mystery behind the outbreak to save his sick daughter.
fields.excerpt: When an outsider visits a village, its inhabitants experience a mysterious epidemic. A police officer then tries to solve the mystery behind the outbreak to save his sick daughter.

fields.title: The Gentlemen
fields.synopsis: When cannabis mogul Mickey Pearson plans to sell his profitable marijuana empire following his retirement, it stimulates an array of wrongdoings in the name of greed.
fields.excerpt: When cannabis mogul Mickey Pearson plans to sell his profitable marijuana empire following his retirement, it stimulates an array of wrongdoings in the name of greed.
